name: The Purgatory Curse
description:
My attempt to combine what i have learnt so far into a game which combines a bit horror, sci-fi and just plain shooting for fun. A little story to start with but 4 different game themes to indulge you.

Sill far from complete. 

BugFixes :

*Fixed player falling endlessly in Zombie Blaster

*Adjusted ammo amounts and pickups in Zombieblaster

*Fixed VaultPortal appearing before 5th wave in ZombieBlaster

*Added some lights on the corner stairs where it was too dark to see the edge,

*Adjusted intro ambience sound so it isn't so loud

* Fixed cursor not showing when game begins
